author: Arizona Republic, Chelsea Curtis, Arizona Republic
title: Arizona man dies after ingesting chloroquine in hopes of treating coronavirus
description: Banner Health said chloroquine, a malaria medication, should not be ingested to treat or prevent the virus. The man's wife is in critical condition.
content:
PHOENIX A man has died and his wife was in critical care Monday after the couple ingested a chemical as self-medication for the new coronavirus, Banner Health announced in a press release.
Thecouple, both in their 60s, ingested chloroquine phosphate, which i… [+4239 chars]
